parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Get group with given unique ID. For objects use [[objectFromNetId]]. As this command is MP only, you can use [[BIS_fnc_groupFromNetId]], which extends the use to SP as well.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''groupFromNetId''' id

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> id: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_group = [[groupFromNetId]] "4:45";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[objectFromNetId]], [[netId]], [[BIS_fnc_objectFromNetId]], [[BIS_fnc_netId]], [[BIS_fnc_groupFromNetId]]
</value></part></template></root>
